https://tmrev.io/movie/13755-A Town Without Christmas 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/mOfTdPm3rGaxAQlqd9qi750sKYG.jpg In the small town of Seacliff, Wash., a child's letter to Santa Claus captures the nation's attention. When the little boy, Chris, writes that he wishes to leave this world so he will no longer be a burden to his divorcing parents, a race begins to find him before he harms himself. A Town Without Christmas
